chapter.title: Installation of XHP
chapter.para: XHP augments the syntax of Hack and PHP such that XML document fragments become valid PHP expressions (see Typing XHP for more information).

However, in order to use XHP and avoid errors like:
Fatal error: Class undefined: xhp_html in /
you need to include the XHP library in your project.
You can find the XHP library in Github. Put the files found here somewhere in your source tree.

Finally, either (1) change the XHP files from <?php to <?hh // decl (since XHP class name is supported out of the box in Hack) or (2) set hhvm.eval.enable_xhp=true in your .ini file or directly on the command line when running HHVM.
Finally include init.php; before you use any XHP functionality.
